SecurityPolicy.description: The `SecurityPolicy` resource provides a central point to configure the security policy of a manager.
SecurityPolicy.longDescription: This resource shall represent configurable security-related policies managed by a manager.  All security parameters in other resources that are controlled by the manager shall follow the related settings in this security policy.  For example, an outbound TLS connection established per an `EventDestination` resource will follow the values of the properties in the `TLS` property.
